body.head: Nathan Broder (born New York, Dec 1, 1905; died New York, Dec 16, 1967)

div.p: Nathan Broder (born New York, Dec 1, 1905; died New York, Dec 16, 1967), American editor and musicologist, associate editor of The Musical Quarterly (1945-67); he was involved editorially with New York publishers G. Schirmer and W. W. Norton, and taught at Columbia University (1946-62).
There is no correspondence between Schenker and Broder; he wrote an article jointly with Arthur Waldeck on Schenker's theory.

Bibliography: Arthur Waldeck & Nathan Broder, "Musical Synthesis as Expounded by Heinrich Schenker," Musical Mercury 2 (1935), 56-64 (photocopy, plus incomplete typed German trans. preserved as OJ 58/22)
